metadata.title: CVE-2020-27794 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: A double free issue was discovered in radare2 in cmd_info.c:cmd_info().Successful exploitation could lead to modification of unexpected memorylocations and potentially causing a crash.

criterions.comment: radare2: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
